metadata.title: USN-4631-1 -- libmaxminddb vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libmaxminddb incorrectly handled certain memory operations. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause applications using libmaxminddb to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4631-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  mmdb-bin - 1.4.2-0ubuntu1.20.04.1 libmaxminddb-dev - 1.4.2-0ubuntu1.20.04.1 libmaxminddb0 - 1.4.2-0ubuntu1.20.04.1 No subscription required
